729374f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Road - Odin Street
729374f-a.text:
2475 Richmond Road, adjoining the N.E. corner of
Odin Street (Union Place). The house belonged to J.
M. Davis in 1874 and to G.A. Meyer from 1898 to 1907.
Dates refer to maps on which the owners' names appear.
April 30, 1929
P. L. Sperr
729374f-a.folder: Richmond Road & Odin Street, Staten Island, NY
